attributes.action: Close Charring Cross Gender Indentity Clinic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charring Cross G.I.C. should be closed down due to it'sfailiure to comply to the standards as laid out by Harry Benjiman. They bring thier own personal wiews into work with them and only select those who fit thier idea of what a woman / female is and should be each person is different, no two people are the same, we should therefore not be treated as stereotypes in one catagory.
